Uses of Package
org.eclipse.ltk.core.refactoring.history

  • Packages that use org.eclipse.ltk.core.refactoring.history 
    Package Description
    org.eclipse.ltk.core.refactoring
    Application programmer interface to implement semantic preserving workspace transformations.
    org.eclipse.ltk.core.refactoring.history
    Application programming interface to query refactoring history information from the refactoring infrastructure.
    org.eclipse.ltk.core.refactoring.model
    Application programming interface to support logical models.
    org.eclipse.ltk.ui.refactoring.history
    Application programming interface to display and preview refactoring history information.
    org.eclipse.ltk.ui.refactoring.model
    Application programming interface to provide model integration for refactoring histories.
  • Classes in org.eclipse.ltk.core.refactoring.history used by org.eclipse.ltk.core.refactoring 
    Class and Description
    IRefactoringHistoryService
    Interface for a refactoring history service.
    RefactoringHistory
    Object which represents a sequence of executed refactorings with optional time information.
  • Classes in org.eclipse.ltk.core.refactoring.history used by org.eclipse.ltk.core.refactoring.history 
    Class and Description
    IRefactoringExecutionListener
    Interface for refactoring execution listeners.
    IRefactoringHistoryListener
    Interface for refactoring history listeners.Clients may register a refactoring history listener with the IRefactoringHistoryService obtained by calling RefactoringCore.getHistoryService() in order to get informed about refactoring history events.
    IRefactoringHistoryService
    Interface for a refactoring history service.
    RefactoringExecutionEvent
    Event object to communicate refactoring execution notifications.
    RefactoringHistory
    Object which represents a sequence of executed refactorings with optional time information.
    RefactoringHistoryEvent
    Event object to communicate refactoring history notifications.
  • Classes in org.eclipse.ltk.core.refactoring.history used by org.eclipse.ltk.core.refactoring.model 
    Class and Description
    RefactoringHistory
    Object which represents a sequence of executed refactorings with optional time information.
